data.text: @giulio_mattioli The sooner private jet use is taxed at a level which reflects its environmental impact, the better...
@giulio_mattioli Think so in the U.K. too so expect it elsewhere. Seen reports of increased noise complaints and busyness at Biggin Hill airport (private one south of London) https://t.co/X6xMkcXmeJ

@DianaUrge @giulio_mattioli Yes, there were certainly news stories about European families clubbing together (or not) to charter planes in reaction to changing travel restrictions etc and “realising how affordable it is”.

@giulio_mattioli Already at the beginning of the pandemic it became apparent that rich people are not affected by it
https://t.co/FExzDaaGFi
@giulio_mattioli I think unfortunatel6 this was a worldwide phen9menon, not only restricted to the us
@giulio_mattioli Ja, ganz supi!🤡🤦‍♀️ Es bestätigt, dass Reiche durch Krisen gut durchkommen und damit weiter die Krisen befeuern.
